body_html:
@cancan101 For tensorflow 1.2.0-rc2 it gives this error:
UnimplementedError: Generic conv implementation only supports NHWC tensor format for now.
[[Node: Conv2D = Conv2D[T=DT_FLOAT, data_format="NCHW", padding="VALID", strides=[1, 1, 1, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0"](Conv2D/input, Conv2D/filter)]]

Close for now because I think this solves your problem, if not, please reopen.

body:
@cancan101 For tensorflow 1.2.0-rc2 it gives this error:
UnimplementedError: Generic conv implementation only supports NHWC tensor format for now.
	 [[Node: Conv2D = Conv2D[T=DT_FLOAT, data_format="NCHW", padding="VALID", strides=[1, 1, 1, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0"](Conv2D/input, Conv2D/filter)]]

Close for now because I think this solves your problem, if not, please reopen.
